page.title: 07SHOPS AND BUSINESSES
page.content: There are several varied businesses in our area. They include a woodyard,a transport depot and several garages and car sale sites.In{Scothern}there is a building firm, a Post Office and a nursery.{Sudbrooke}has no shops except a small hairdressing salon.There is also a riding school in {Sudbrooke}that is increasing in popularity but no other major amenities to date. {Langworth}has two shops and a woodyard.There is also a poultry products factory.The two shops include a Post Office and a small bakery aswell as general goods.Major haulage firms have depots in the area."Pick-Your-Own" fruit farms and market gardens are a feature of the area.
